english_example_sentence: If the diligent student finds the difficult book, he will be happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если прилежный студент найдет сложную книгу, он будет счастлив.
turkish_example_sentence: Çalışkan öğrenci zor kitabı bulsa, mutlu olur.
